title: The Last of Us Part 1 Reviews Worse than Original - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.31.22
description:
Blessing and Greg talk about these Last of Us Part 1 reviews, PlayStation investing in From Software, and whether or not PlayStation Plus is improving.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:52 - Housekeeping

Our review of The Last of Us Part 1 is up right now as a Kinda Funny Gamescast. That’s me, Greg, Parris, and Andy all giving our thoughts on the game. Check that out right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.

The Roper Report  -

00:04:29 - The Last of Us Part 1 Review Round-Up
00:29:53 - PlayStation’s Plus games for September have been revealed!
00:44:07 - Ad
00:47:35 - Sony and Tencent Have Bought Over 30% of FromSoftware
00:55:00 - Quantic Dream has been acquired
01:02:37 - Konami says it will announce a new game from a series ‘loved around the world’
01:04:26 - IO’s James Bond may not be out until at least 2025
01:06:10 - Out today
01:07:40 - Squad Up: Nathan Choquette - Pokemon GO - IndieRonin
01:08:23 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
